entity

Class OrderSheetPerTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.OrderSheetPerTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class OrderSheetPerTable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    OrderSheetPerTable class contains of what each table has ordered during each turnover. One OrderSheetPerTable object to one Table Object.
    Since:
    9/11/2016
    Author:
    Shide, Eeyern, Grace, Xi Tong
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
